price: 95. Waxaa ka reebban magaalo aan halaagnay inayan dib u soo laabaneyn29.
arabic: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: 29. Uma soo laaban karaan adduunkan, mana u toobad keeni karaan Alle.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waḥarāmun ʿalā qaryatin ahlaknāhā annahum lā yarjiʿūna
